backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling user profiles, role-based admin authorization, and CRUD operations for contact requests with topic filtering.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing donation-section replacement and reward-tier rendering requirements with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing behavior and purpose of all major frontend components, hooks, config, and documentation files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/RUN-LOCAL-AND-DEPLOY-IC.md: Guide for running the project locally and deploying it to the Internet Computer with setup steps and troubleshooting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app assembling all site sections, managing selected episode state, and configuring React Query client.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Section displaying the series synopsis from config using a styled prose layout.
frontend/src/components/AdminSection.tsx: Admin dashboard enabling authentication, viewing/exporting contact requests, toggling request status, and granting admin roles.
frontend/src/components/CharactersSectio: Renders a characters grid using animeSiteConfig, displaying images, metadata, bios, and conditional elements.
frontend/src/components/ClansSection.tsx: Displays a list of predefined clans with their sigils and descriptions in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Implements a contact form with validation, backend submission, and user feedback via toast notifications.
Lists episodes from config and triggers episode selection while scrolling to the video section.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with copyright text, YouTube link, and donation info.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner with background image, title, CTA buttons, and smooth-scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/IntroSection.tsx: Shows an intro video with fallback link and a synopsis excerpt using configurable URLs and text.
frontend/src/components/RewardsSection.t: Renders the donation and rewards section, including a Cash App block and dynamic reward tiers from the config.
frontend/src/components/SectionHeader.ts: Displays a styled section header with a title and accent underline.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Implements a responsive top navigation bar with scroll handling and section scrolling.
frontend/src/components/VideoSection.tsx: Shows a video player that switches sources by episode, handles load errors, and provides a fallback link.
frontend/src/components/WorldbuildingSec: Displays worldbuilding info including clans, eyes, power system, ranks, and family details from config.
frontend/src/content/animeSiteConfig.ts: Defines site-wide configuration including story text, video data, reward tiers, and worldbuilding settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting, fetching, and updating contact requests, verifying admin status, and granting admin roles.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global styles, theme variables, fonts, and Tailwind layers for light/dark manga-inspired UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeIntroEmbedUr: Converts common video URLs into iframe‑ready embed formats for YouTube and Vimeo.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Smoothly scrolls the page to a target section with an adjustable offset.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and manga‑styled theme extensions.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, current state, and pending requests for updating the Donation section.
